plot: This is the story of Raul and Pere, a mountaineer and filmmaker united by a common dream: to climb for the first time a mountain higher than 8,000 meters.
title: Els homes que volien pujar una muntanya de més de 8.000 metres
plot_es: This is the story of Raul and Pere, a mountaineer and filmmaker united by a common dream: to climb for the first time a mountain higher than 8,000 meters.
original_name: Els homes que volien pujar una muntanya de més de 8.000 metres
plot_en: This is the story of Raul and Pere, a mountaineer and filmmaker united by a common dream: to climb for the first time a mountain higher than 8,000 meters.
